question: What are the current trends in IT investments across different companies in the technology industry?

subtasks.task: Identify companies in the technology industry to analyze their IT investment metrics.
Gather the IT budgets and financial metrics of the selected companies to evaluate their investment levels.
Analyze the IT focus areas of these companies to understand their strategic tech investments and priorities.
Examine the company deal master records to assess any active contracts related to technology services that reflect investment trends.
Explore past and current social media engagement from these companies to identify public sentiments and focus areas that reflect their IT investments.
